title: tiny sans "Testing"
content:
Hi guys,

I would be obliged if you could identify the font in the attached logo..

Thanks

waves

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [coe\_menu\_04.GIF](http://web.archive.org/web/20060502100054/http:/typophile.com/files/coe_menu_04.GIF) | 277 bytes |
author: wavesonwings

comments.content: Pls can someone help me urgently

‘Arial’ / ‘Helvetica’?  
_( Quite hard to tell, from this tiny sample. )_

Dav

or Chalet?  
 [http://www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=140&subpage=viewfonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20060502100054/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=140&subpage=viewfonts)

Tim  
{edit: cancel that, the t is the wrong shape}

So small. Very hard to confirm. Could be one of the [FF Schulbuchs](http://web.archive.org/web/20060502100054/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontpackage&startrow=1&records=&currpage=1&totalrecords=6&displayfontid=FF.2797.0.0&fontRendererText=Testing).
